thread.title: CHRISTINE

author: CHRISTINE
title: CHRISTINE
text:
We have used Trusted Housesitters on a number of occasions and have welcomed sitters from all walks of life into our home and to care for our little angels!
Not once have we had a bad experience and have actually made firm friends with all our sitters.
Our two Lhaso Apsos have been treated like Princes and have never been stressed when we have returned from holidays/business trips and that is our main reason for using Trusted Housesitters - we would never use kennels for our dogs.
My only regret is that I did not think of this idea - what an incredible service they provide.
Well done trusted Housesitters!
CHRIS PRASHAD
